legal_basis: Section 87.1 of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
procedural_fairness: disclosing use of HRSDC wage data to the applicant
evidence_assessment: HRSDC wage data used to assess job complexity
decision_reasoning: permissibility of using HRSDC wage data, need for procedural fairness
application_details: applicant's permanent residency application denied based on work experience assessment
result_of_case: decision set aside, case remanded for re-determination
